{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}

-- | Confluent relational mapping

module Koshucode.Baala.Minimal.Relmap.Confl
( -- * Confluent
  meet, join,
  hang, selfhang,
  maybe, mmaybe,
  -- * Restriction
  some, minus
) where

import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Data
import Prelude hiding (maybe)
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Kit as Kit

{-# ANN module "HLint: ignore Reduce duplication" #-}

-- | Meet two relations.
--   Meeting operation is a generalized intersection.
meet :: (Ord v) => Kit.RelmapBin v
meet rm2 = Kit.calc "meet" meet2 [rm2]

meet2 :: Ord v => [Rel v] -> Rel v -> Rel v
meet2 [r2] r1 = Rel h3 b3 where
    Rel h1 args1 = r1
    Rel h2 args2 = r2

    posh12 = Kit.headPosh h1 h2
    share1 = Kit.headPoss h1 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    share2 = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    side2  = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possOuter posh12

    m2 = Kit.gatherToMap $ map pair args2
    pair arg2 = (Kit.possPick share2 arg2,
                 Kit.possPick side2  arg2)

    h3 = Kit.mappend h2 h1
    b3 = concatMap step args1
    step arg1 = case Kit.lookupMap (Kit.possPick share1 arg1) m2 of
                  Just side -> map (++ arg1) side
                  Nothing   -> []

meet2 _ _ = undefined

-- | Join two relations.
--   Joining operation is a generalized union.
join :: (Ord v) => Kit.RelmapBin v
join rm2 = Kit.calc "join" join2 [rm2]

join2 :: Ord v => [Rel v] -> Rel v -> Rel v
join2 [r2] r1 = Rel h3 b3 where
    Rel h1 args1 = r1
    Rel h2 args2 = r2

    posh12 = Kit.possInner $ Kit.headPosh h1 h2
    pick1  = Kit.possPick $ Kit.headPoss h1 posh12
    pick2  = Kit.possPick $ Kit.headPoss h2 posh12

    h3 = Kit.rehead pick1 h1
    b3 = Kit.unique $ map pick1 args1
                   ++ map pick2 args2

join2 _ _ = undefined

-- | Hanging relation, like grouping.
hang :: (Ord v, RelValue v) => String -> Kit.RelmapBin v
hang ns rm2 = Kit.calc "hang" (Kit.withP2 hang2 ns) [rm2]

hang2 :: (Ord v, RelValue v) => [String] -> [Rel v] -> Rel v -> Rel v
hang2 [n] [r2] r1 = Rel h3 b3 where
    Rel h1 args1 = r1
    Rel h2 args2 = r2

    posh12 = Kit.headPosh h1 h2
    share1 = Kit.headPoss h1 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    share2 = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    --side2  = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possOuter posh12

    m2 = Kit.gatherToMap $ map pair args2
    pair arg2 = (Kit.possPick share2 arg2, arg2)

    h3 = Relhead $ Nest n (headTerms h2) : (headTerms h1)
    b3 = map step args1
    step arg1 = case Kit.lookupMap (Kit.possPick share1 arg1) m2 of
                  Just args2' -> (relValue $ Rel h2 args2') : arg1
                  Nothing     -> []

hang2 _ _ _ = undefined

selfhang :: a
selfhang = undefined

-- | like SQL's left join
maybe :: (Ord v, Nil v) => Kit.RelmapBin v
maybe rm2 = Kit.calc "maybe" maybe2 [rm2]

maybe2 :: (Ord v, Nil v) => [Rel v] -> Rel v -> Rel v
maybe2 [r2] r1 = Rel h3 b3 where
    Rel h1 args1 = r1
    Rel h2 args2 = r2

    posh12 = Kit.headPosh h1 h2
    share1 = Kit.headPoss h1 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    share2 = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    side2  = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possOuter posh12

    m2 = Kit.gatherToMap $ map pair args2
    pair arg2 = (Kit.possPick share2 arg2,
                 Kit.possPick side2  arg2)

    h3 = Kit.mappend h2 h1
    b3 = concatMap step args1
    nils = replicate (headDegree h3 - headDegree h1) nil
    step arg1 = case Kit.lookupMap (Kit.possPick share1 arg1) m2 of
                  Just side -> map (++ arg1) side
                  Nothing   -> [nils ++ arg1]

maybe2 _ _ = undefined

-- | like SQL's full join
mmaybe :: (Ord v, Nil v) => Kit.RelmapBin v
mmaybe rm2 = Kit.calc "mmaybe" mmaybe2 [rm2]

mmaybe2 :: (Ord v, Nil v) => [Rel v] -> Rel v -> Rel v
mmaybe2 [r2] r1 = r5 where
    r3 = maybe2 [r2] r1
    r4 = maybe2 [r1] r2
    r5 = join2  [r3] r4
mmaybe2 _ _ = undefined

some :: (Ord v) => Kit.RelmapBin v
some  = semi "some"  True

minus :: (Ord v) => Kit.RelmapBin v
minus = semi "minus" False

semi :: (Ord v) => String -> Bool -> Kit.RelmapBin v
semi name which rm2 = Kit.calc name (semi2 which) [rm2]

semi2 :: (Ord v) => Bool -> [Rel v] -> Rel v -> Rel v
semi2 which [r2] r1 = Rel h3 b3 where
    Rel h1 args1 = r1
    Rel h2 args2 = r2

    posh12 = Kit.headPosh h1 h2
    share1 = Kit.headPoss h1 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    share2 = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possInner posh12
    --side2  = Kit.headPoss h2 $ Kit.possOuter posh12

    m2 = Kit.gatherToMap $ map pair args2
    pair arg2 = (Kit.possPick share2 arg2, True)

    h3 = Kit.mappend h2 h1
    b3 = filter step args1
    step arg1 = case Kit.lookupMap (Kit.possPick share1 arg1) m2 of
                  Just _  -> which
                  Nothing -> not which

semi2 _ _ _ = undefined
